{{wikipedia|Hiragana}}
==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|ひら|か|k2=が|な|r=y}}

===Etymology===
Compound of {{compound|平|tr1=hira|t1=flat, smooth|仮名|tr2=kana|lang=ja}}, which voices to -''gana'' due to [[w:Rendaku|suffixation]].

===Pronunciation===
{{ja-pron|ひらがな|acc=3|acc2=h|acc3=o|acc_ref=NHK,DJR,SMK5|acc2_ref=NHK|acc3_ref=NHK}}

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|ひらがな|kyu=平假名}}

# a Japanese syllabary script
#* {{RQ:Nippo Jisho|242}}
#*: '''Firagana'''. ヒラガナ (平仮名) 日本の文字の一種.
# (as opposed to complex kanji) simple
